author: Erin Bryce
text:
The City-County Communications and Marketing Association, 3CMA, will be hosting a regional conference on May 2-3, 2013 in Miami Beach. Facebook is among the lineup to address public communicators.
For information, visit: http://www.3cma.org/index.aspx?nid=813 
Government representatives are invited to attend this informative Southeast regional conference. Themed "Step Up! Communications", the conference will focus on ways to enrich and enhance communication efforts in government. 
Guest speakers include Facebook, the Florida Attorney General's Office, and top public communicators from accross the United States (including some of your peers).
We hope you will consider taking advantage of this training opportunity in the Sunshine State.
title: 3CMA Regional Conference in Miami Beach to feature Facebook
